attributes.action: deny the existence of god or present proof to the contrary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Faith is a personal matter and should be free of state involvement - this must include it's financing, promotion and defense. In this 21st century we wish to leave behind the barriers of primitive belief and superstition, and enter an age of enlightened learning and tolerance.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
